description.fr: Vaincre tous les Tofus. \--- {%FightStarted} Les {Summoning:714,plural:other} prennent leur {PropertyEffect:16}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} 3\_{Summoning:714,plural:other} aléatoires atterrissent sur leur case.
description.en: Defeat all the Tofus. \--- {%FightStarted} The {Summoning:714,plural:other} take {PropertyEffect:16}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} 3\_random {Summoning:714,plural:other} land on their cells.
description.es: Vencer a todos los tofus. \--- {%FightStarted} Los {Summoning:714,plural:other} alzan el {PropertyEffect:16}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} 3\_{Summoning:714,plural:other} aleatorios aterrizan en su casilla.
description.de: Alle Tofus besiegen. \--- {%FightStarted} Die {Summoning:714,plural:other} erhalten ihre {PropertyEffect:16}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} 3\_zufällige {Summoning:714,plural:other} landen auf ihrem Feld.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Tofus. \--- {%FightStarted} Os {Summoning:714,plural:other} alçam um {PropertyEffect:16}. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} 3\_{Summoning:714,plural:other} aleatórios aterrissam sobre as células deles.
